Overview

Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West is an upcoming Landmark Commercial Project in Greater Noida. This Commercial Project is being built by Trehan Group, a third-generation builder known for legendary projects such as Tihar Jail, Supreme Court, and Sanchar Bhavan in Delhi. And the Architecture is Designed by BENOY, one of the best architect firms in the world, known for Ferrari World World in Abu Dhabi, World Trade Center in China, Beverly Center in the USA, and a lot more.


IRIS Broadway is located on a 130m wide Noida-Greater Noida Link road connecting Gaur Chowk to Pari Chowk and Yamuna Expressway. This project is going to be next to the upcoming Metro Line Project, with a metro station at walking distance. With over 3 Lakhs of current Population residing within 5 km radius around this project, we're projecting 8 Lakhs of population in the near future that this project can cater to as an all-in-one Shopping, Entertainment, and Working space Building.


This Project is spread over 3.5 acres of fully paid-up land. It has a 6 floored, centrally air-conditioned main building, having 0.75 acres of atrium in the center and a open roof fine-dining restaurant space. The Central Building has Retail Shops, Entertainment Zone, Multiplex, Food-Courts, and Fine-Dining Restaurants. There are two towers of each side, where the left tower has Banquet halls and a Hotel with Infinity Pool already being tied-up with JW Marriot Courtyard and the other Omega Tower on the right is all up for office spaces.

Resale Shops for Sale in Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West

Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West shops are available for sale as both fresh and resale units. The shops held with us or our close-knit investors are available at a very reasonable price. The shops will be at one of the best locations of the mall as these shops were booked almost three years back. Most of the shops are either atrium facing shops, the prime shops are the corner shops facing the atrium. Resale and rentals of these shops will be high. For most of the shops no brokerage will be charged from the buyers.

Resale foodCourts for Sale in Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West

Foodcourt of Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West are the best food-courts available in Delhi-NCR. Location of the project is prime as it is right at the center of a population hub of Greater Noida West. Loading on the food-courts is amazingly low, even to the extent that one food-court will give you more area than two food-courts of other builders. In all a food court in Trehan Iris Broadway Greno west is a best buy property. Rentals from the food court will be high. We will provide you with the best price and best location food courts held with us / with our investors.

Resale Anchor Shops for Sale in Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West

Anchor shops in Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West project are available in single as well as bulk buying. Anchor shops will give assured return and rental both before and post possession of the units, the rental value / assured return value will differ from shop to shop. Anchor shops will be provided at low price, resale units are few in number, however, fresh units will be given to the buyer at the lowest price. Assured gifts will be given to the buyer of Anchor shops.

Resale Office spaces for Sale in Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West

Office space in Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West will come up in phase 2 of the project. Likely delivery of the office units will be in mid 2027. All office spaces will be the prime offices with double height entry, personal balconies and one dedicated floor for facilities. Office spaces are available in resale at a very reasonable price, offices with PLC and without PLC are also available. We have investor's units at a low price and we can also provide fresh units at the lowest possible price.

This Project is being built of a 100% Commercial land.

12% Assured Return on all the shops except office space until possession.

BENOY Architect & Design

BENOY, known for Dubai Mall, Ferrari World Abu Dhabi, Beverly Mall USA

Full-AC Central AC System

The Complex is 100% packed and has central Air-conditioning.

3rd Generation Builder

100% price of the land is already paid by the builder in advance.

JW Marriot Courtyard Tie-up

Left Tower is tied up with JW Marriot with an infinity pool at terrace top

50+ Brands Tie-up

More than 50 Brands have tied up with this project.

On-Lease Except Office Space

Builder will have the leasing rights to the shops except office space.

130 m Wide Main Road

Mall is located on 130m wide Noida-Greater Noida Link Road.

Metro Station In-front of the Mall

Upcoming metro line will pass through Noida-Greater Noida Link Road.

Jewar International Airport

New Upcoming Jewar International Airport will be 60 mins away.

3 Lakh Current Population

Working and Residential Population within 5 Km radius of the project.

8 Lakh Expected Population

At the current growth rate, we're expecting 8 lakhs of total population.

MIVAN Based Construction

MIVAN is new technology in construction building earthquake resistant.

Location Map

Nearby Facilities

Trehan Iris Broadway Greno West project is situated in EcoTech 12, in Greater Noida West. Project is on 130 meter road that connects Noida to Greater Noida via Gaur City. The locaation of the project is prime as it is three side open, with 130 meter road in-front of the project and 24 meter road behind the project. The project has very high visibility and foot-fall at the project should be high as more than 60,000 dwelling units are in close vicinity.
To reach the project one has to come to Noida city center and should keep moving straight under the metro line. From sector 52 metro one can take underpass, go over parthala bridge and cross Hindon river. Hindon river is the boundary beween Noida and Greater-Noida. From here after crossing 3 round-abouts one can see the project on left side. This is next to "EK Murti chowk"
This location is the most premium location of Delhi - NCR because of the high population in this area and because of the connectivity of the Noida / Ghaziabad to Jewar Airport is through this location. One can expect one of the heighest foot-fall of Dleh NCR in this mall.

About Trehan

Trehan Group, is a third generation builders and all a well reputed builder in Delhi-NCR region. They're known for building projects which are part of national legacy such as Tihar Jail, Sanchar Bhavan, Parliament House, and Supreme Court. In recent times, they've successfully Developed and Delivered multiple Commercial and Residential Projects in Delhi-NCR, such as Trehan IRIS Broadway Sec-85 in Gurugram, Trehan Luxury Floors in Sec-35 Gurugram, IRIS Techpark, IRIS Cyber Tower, IRIS Gomati, IRIS AAVAAS and a lot more projects.

They have their own team of construction workers and equipment making a project cost-effective. They are also well experienced in Leasing based Mall Operations, ensuring consistent flow of rental income.
